CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper November 24, 1956, pg. A10, reads: "Bethel Honors Pastor and Wife - Pausing in the midst of their drive for building a new edifice, members of Bethel AME Church gave a welcome reception for the Rev. and Mrs. C. S. Spivey Jr. Monday evening. Mrs. Agatha Fields, fourth from left, presents the Rev. Mr. and Mrs. Spivey with a cash gift from the members. Others are, left to right, The Rev. Mr. Spivey Jr., Mrs Spivey, Mrs. Georgia Johnson, chairman of the affair; Mrs. Fields and Mrs. Katie Everette Johnson, who emceed the program. - Teenie Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Rev. C. S. Spivey Jr., Mrs. Spivey, Georgia Johnson, Agatha Fields presenting envelope to Spivey, and Katie Everette Johnson in Bethel AME Church
